column1: A lot of people with Tourette's have different tics. My tic  is that I have to bend my neck and snap her fingers. But a lot of people don't even notice it.
Do we put the 3-D glasses on now, da-da?
The Coon? I've heard of that.
I saw on TV. That superhero group that's helping with the Gulf spill. Coon and Friends.
Can I ask you a question?
Do you know Mint-Berry Crunch? What's he like?
Well, there is one person who I always used to ask when I needed advice.
Me neither. I have to have sugar or I'm going to die.
Two donuts and a pack of licorice, please.
